IO

Class BinaryOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • IO.BinaryOutput

  • public class BinaryOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for writing binary data into the output stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryOutput(java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
      Creates binary output stream from DataOutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearBuffer()
      Writes the bits which are left in buffer into output stream.
      void close()
      Clears buffer, flushes and closes the output stream.
      void write(int code, int n)
      Writes n-bit integer to the output stream.
      void writeBit(boolean bit)
      Method, that writes a bit to the output stream.
      void writeByte(int x)
      Used for writing 8-bit byte into output stream one bit at a time.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryOutput

        public BinaryOutput(java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
        Creates binary output stream from DataOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        dos - DataOutputStream used for output.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(int code,
                  int n)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes n-bit integer to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        code - being written as bits.
        n - Integer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeBit

        public void writeBit(boolean bit)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Method, that writes a bit to the output stream. First adds bit to buffer, if there is 8 bits in buffer writes them out as a byte.
        Parameters:
        bit - boolean bit that is being written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • clearBuffer

        public void clearBuffer()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the bits which are left in buffer into output stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Clears buffer, flushes and closes the output stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeByte

        public void writeByte(int x)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Used for writing 8-bit byte into output stream one bit at a time.
        Parameters:
        x - Integer value of the byte from 0 to 256.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
